_comment: Ship definitions. Each ship has unique stats, phase shift config, and starting weapon. Stats only listed here override base_player_stats.json defaults.

starchaser.name: Starchaser
starchaser.description: Fast and agile reconnaissance vessel. Perfect for beginners.

phase_shift.name: Phase Shift
phase_shift.description: Standard phase shift with moderate range

phantom.name: Phantom
phantom.description: Lightning fast strike craft. High risk, high reward.

phase_shift.name: Blink
phase_shift.description: Instant teleport with no trail, shorter range but faster recharge

dreadnought.name: Dreadnought
dreadnought.description: Heavy armored vessel. Slow but incredibly durable.

phase_shift.name: Ram Shift
phase_shift.description: Slower shift but damages and knocks back enemies in path

viper.name: Viper
viper.description: Single-seat dogfighter built for speed and precision. One pilot, one purpose: kill everything.

phase_shift.name: Afterburner
phase_shift.description: Boost forward at extreme speed, gaining brief attack speed on exit

prometheus.name: U.S.E. Prometheus SF-1701-A
prometheus.description: Multi-role science cruiser with advanced sensor arrays and generous shield generators. Slow to maneuver but bristling with utility.

phase_shift.name: Deflector Pulse
phase_shift.description: Emits an energy wave that pushes all nearby enemies away instead of moving the ship
